iati-activity.title: Child Protection and Advocacy (CPA) Project
iati-activity.description: The aim of this project is to empower local communities to protect 4200 girls and 3820 boys in the target communities from abuse, neglect, exploitation and other forms of violence within their families and communities. The project will promote life skills programme among children to build their resilience, will support the process of transforming individuals and community attitudes, socio-cultural traditions and laws and behaviour towards equality and justice for children.
